channel.title: WaleedScape needs a development team!
channel.description:
Hello moparscapians! :rolleyes: I kept my server, WaleedScape up for at least 1 month, then i figured that my coding sucked ass. my minigames were at 7% most of my items were nulled, and my NPC's, models, and animations were at 10% or less. and the reason why i kept the server running so long is because 1 kid told me on the server
Holy shit man! this is some c00l st00f u hve here!
he tried using the nulls as armour, and he told me "i cant use these null things.." i just lol'd so hard at him, then i just took the server down. his user was Reijou. Anyways! if u can do the following, please tell me. im desperate for coders as this is my first year on mopar. thanks guys! [size=24pt]Positions[/size] Coder1 coder2 coder3 GFX Master bugs+glitches Master (not sure what to call that...) Client positions: Animation master Modelor Banner designer (idk the name for this, but some1 who can code in items to client?) I may sound like a real noob, but i know i am. please dont flame and teach me my mistakes and errors, etc well, thats all the positions, if u would like to have one of these positions, please say it in this format: I would like to take position: (choose from 1 above) I have been coding for: (e.g 2 years) My expertise at coding (your chosen pos) is (what your best at in the pos you chose) I am (your age here) my MSN is: (your MSN) Thank you guys, i hope someone will help me out. if u want any pics of the server, ill post them. but sadly, i renewed my source to Deathzscape V2 by bloodmaniet and i need LOTS of stuff to be coded (not demanding here) , i will help too, but i really wont be much of a big help. its best i stay out of ur way, but any requirements to code, or stuff like that, ill be glad to do it Thanks a bunch! EDIT: keeping the source to EvolutionX V5 STILL needs updates

item.title: WaleedScape needs a development team!
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

tack3rs:

If you need me i can code, I have had loads of experience

please state what you can code in the format i used. and please state ur MSN

Read full topic

item.title: WaleedScape needs a development team!
item.dc:creator: @srixs srixs
item.description:
@srixs wrote:

I would like to take position: I’m choosing two if you do not mind. So mainly I can design any banner, image, etc. for you. Logos are no problem. I can also code a bit for clients and make them better.
I have been coding for: Well I have ran 4 servers on a stretch of about 2 years.
My expertise at coding: Can code a bit from hear to there. Nothing fancy.
I am: 15
my MSN is: jordy805@live.com

Read full topic

without having to code.

item.title: WaleedScape needs a development team!
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

Sorry. i didnt know. ill remove that stuff. i would rep ifi could because u taught me something. u see im a nub and idk what the heck im doing. thanks again. but did u want to volunteer?
BTW, i didnt say i coded for two years, lol. so, please thoroughly read the post.

Read full topic

item.title: WaleedScape needs a development team!
item.dc:creator: @mrtms mrtms
item.description:
@mrtms wrote:

GFX coder animation coder bugs+glitches coder (lol, im just gonna say coder) item coder banner designer

You have obviously not coded for 2 years. Maybe one. I’ve never heard of the categories “bugs+glitches coder”, "item coder, “animation coder”, “GFX coder”, and “banner designer”. You don’t use “Codes” to make a picture/banner. Usually, on Mopar, we call it “GFX Master”.
“Banner designer” + “GFX Coder” are almost the same thing. Except one is banners, and the other could be crowns, sigs, or many other things… What’s up with the item coder and stuff around that category (E.g. Animation Coder). That’s ALMOST completely client-sided.

Read full topic

item.title: WaleedScape needs a development team!
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

Hello moparscapians! :rolleyes:

I kept my server, WaleedScape up for at least 1 month, then i figured that my coding sucked ass. my minigames were at 7% most of my items were nulled, and my NPC’s, models, and animations were at 10% or less. and the reason why i kept the server running so long is because 1 kid told me on the server

Holy shit man! this is some c00l st00f u hve here!
he tried using the nulls as armour, and he told me "i cant use these null things.." i just lol'd so hard at him, then i just took the server down. his user was Reijou.

Anyways! if u can do the following, please tell me. im desperate for coders as this is my first year on mopar. thanks guys!

[size=24pt]Positions[/size]
Coder1
coder2
coder3
GFX Master
bugs+glitches Master (not sure what to call that…)

Client positions:
Animation master
Modelor
Banner designer
(idk the name for this, but some1 who can code in items to client?)
I may sound like a real noob, but i know i am. please dont flame and teach me my mistakes and errors, etc

well, thats all the positions, if u would like to have one of these positions, please say it in this format:

I would like to take position: (choose from 1 above)
I have been coding for: (e.g 2 years)
My expertise at coding (your chosen pos) is (what your best at in the pos you chose)
I am (your age here)
my MSN is: (your MSN)

Thank you guys, i hope someone will help me out. if u want any pics of the server, ill post them. but sadly, i renewed my source to Deathzscape V2 by bloodmaniet and i need LOTS of stuff to be coded (not demanding here) , i will help too, but i really wont be much of a big help. its best i stay out of ur way, but any requirements to code, or stuff like that, ill be glad to do it

Thanks a bunch!
EDIT: keeping the source to EvolutionX V5 STILL needs updates
